resources.string: You are about to log out
No care options available at th moment.
Hang tight! We’re reviewing your results and will get back to you soon.
\\uD83D\\uDCC5 If your test comes back positive, a clinic checkup will help you get the guidance and support you need.
✅ A negative result is good news! If you’ve had recent risks, consider another test in 3 months to stay sure.
HOW TO USE ORAQUICK®, HIV TEST, PERSONAL USE
YOU WILL NEED TO ESTIMATE THE TEST DURATION
The pouch contains: test devices, a test support device, and usage instructions
LEAVE THE DEVICE IN THE TUBE for 20 MINUTES before reading the result. DO NOT READ the result after 40 minutes.
Remove the device from the tube, cover the tube, and then dispose of everything in the trash bin.
Two complete lines, even if the line is faint, means you may have HIV and need further testing.
Visit a nearby VCT or Health Center. As soon as possible
ONE LINE in the “C” area and NO line in the “T” area, your result is Negative, You Do Not Have HIV. Consider regular testing. If you think you were recently exposed to HIV, retest after three months.

No line in the “C” area (even if there is a line in the “T” area), or if there’s a red color preventing result reading, the test is invalid and should be repeated. You’ll need a new test kit. The test did not work correctly. Visit a nearby VCT or Health Center for additional testing.
If you do not know your result or are unsure of your result, visit a nearby VCT or Health Center for additional testing.
Your HIV test has two connected packs.
Tear the pack on the side with the Tube illustration, then remove the tube.
Remove the cap/lid of the tube. DO NOT SPILL the liquid. DO NOT DRINK it.
Rub the swab on your upper gum once, covering the entire upper gum, then rub it on the entire lower gum once.
Insert the device into the tube until the swab is submerged in the liquid.
Pierce the pouch containing the test device and remove it. DO NOT TOUCH the flat pad with your fingers. DO NOT EAT or ingest the preservative.
Do not spill the liquid. Do not drink it.
Place the tube in the holder.
Welcome to Smarttest, we are glad to have you here! Login to proceed
